channel.title: RS made a update that can backfire them
channel.description:
We would like to remind everyone to NEVER enter their password into the RuneScape chat. Not for ANY reason! In an attempt to better protect our players' passwords, we've updated the game to [b]prevent you from saying any sentence which contain your exact password[/b]. This is only a basic check, however, and it's still [b]extremely unsafe to type your password[/b] into the chat, so please DON'T try it out to see! That would be foolish and extremely dangerous.
Omfg those retards, now ALOT of noobs might think that the filter is 100% sure and keep saying their password, but if there's even a small hole Jagex is in shit since they don't know who lost their account really or who is a liar. Also, the lvl 3 people can now actually say that "Jagex blocks your password, look ******!"

item.title: RS made a update that can backfire them
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

It Takes out the whole sentence and dont come up with *****

Theres a message sayign :Your trying to tell somone your paSS, PLEASE DONT, ECT."

Read full topic

item.title: RS made a update that can backfire them
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“Criptic, post:2, topic:84260”]yes but it will be a bit overous what is my password here is a sentence:

Hey guy i just say the **** black dragon, and it dosnt look that big

comon its pretty easy to guess the password[/quote]

From now on, if you enter your exact password into the chat, the entire sentence will be blocked and you will receive the message:

“You appear to be telling someone your password - please don’t!
If you are not, please change your password to something more obscure!”

u r t3H wrong.

Read full topic
